channel.title: 2020 on Ashish Saxena - My personal thoughts, ideas and rants
channel.description: Recent content in 2020 on Ashish Saxena - My personal thoughts, ideas and rants

item.title: Lockdown and Re-Discovering Life
item.description: Lockdown has to got to be the most interesting time of our lives. Atleast for me I never imagined living this way, it has always been a dream of mine to buy a huge area of land close to a river and just pass my days in the arms of nature doing life’s basic chores but never thought this would come to life ever.

item.title: Moving away from TravisCI to Github Actions
item.description: With the recent changes to TravisCI free account, I walk you through my migration experience and what I feel like are the pros and cons of each platform

item.title: How REAK operates it's IVR/PBX system for $7/mo
item.description: This is the story of how my company runs it’s own cloud PBX / IVR system for a really low running and setup cost, and how your startup or small business can benefit from it.

item.title: Start your own blog for free in 60 seconds
item.description: Starting your own personal blog is a good way of sharing your thoughts and tutorials, This tutorial will guide you in setting up a blog using Github Pages
